thread.title: Photos: America’s Cup World Series Festivities
thread.title_full: Photos: America’s Cup World Series Festivities

author: Deb
title: Photos: America’s Cup World Series Festivities
text:
October 17, 2015 | 2 Comments 
While some sailing fans may have been left disappointed by the cancellation of today’s [Oct 17] America’s Cup racing, there were numerous people out enjoying themselves at the Louis Vuitton America’s Cup World Series, with large crowds to be seen across Front Street. 
The Bermuda Festival and Event Village is offering dozens of vendors and various events, including a skydiving display this afternoon which involved two men jumping out of a helicopter and splashing down in the water. You can see a photo gallery from last night’s Opening Ceremony here , and all our coverage of the America’s Cup here. -
